html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-00902025-02-14ECCC
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Approving the Interim Order Modifying the Operation of Certain Regulations Made Under the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisOrder approving the INTERIM ORDER MODIFYING THE OPERATION OF CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999, made by the Minister of the Environment on January 31, 2025, in order to extend the suspension of the application of the trailer provisions in the Heavy-duty Vehicle and Engine Greenhouse Gas Emission Regulations for a period of up to one year from the date the interim order was issued.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order approving the INTERIM ORDER MODIFYING THE OPERATION OF CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999, made by the Minister of the Environment on January 31, 2025, in order to extend the suspension of the application of the trailer provisions in the Heavy-duty Vehicle and Engine Greenhouse Gas Emission Regulations for a period of up to one year from the date the interim order was issued.
